title: Les Emmerdeurs
overview: At the heart of World War II, four teenagers with a common taste for rebelliousness start developing amazing abilities after accidentally drinking a serum created by German scientists working for the Nazis. From now on, Albert, whose original mission was to get hold of the serum for the French resistance, will have no choice but to protect this unlikely bunch of superheroes - provided they all stop acting like 'pains in the neck'.
